name: CAC Fan Group Expansion

blackCards.text: Hey guys, not to spoil this, but ___.
___'s life was complete when they were shipped with ___.
Guys, I have an important question. ___?
I joined the Skype call while everyone was talking about ___.
___ rustled ___'s jimmies with ___.
___ set off the Landmine.
Roll a D20 for a ___ check.
What does the fox say?
Posting NSFW pictures of ___ and ___.
Everyone laughed when the White Card ___ was submitted.
I couldn't go to bed because ___ was happening in the Skype call.
Everyone went silent when ___ did ___ in the RP.
___ swore a blood oath because they did ___.
___ ate breadsticks infront of ___ because it was funny.
___ should totally be the voice of ___.
Enjoy the ___, Fuckers!
I hate it when people keep posting ___.
Someone called Eillah ___.
___ was a Changeling the whole time.
Meti ended the campaign on a dark note when ___ killed ___.
All hell broke loose on deviantart when ___ change their name to ___.

whiteCards: Slow escalation of laughter to put in a good card
Making your friends mad on purpose
Making our own album for the hell of it
Shut up, I'm trying to read the cards!
Acquiring the Golden Sword and fighting them irl
Goblins with Too Much Hair Gel
Sporadically bursting into song over Skype
Rarity's Bigger Blacker Dick 2: The Electric Boogaloo
Crazy's Skype Call House of Fun
Sporadically changing the RP into an ERPG
Playing Through the Fire and the Flames on Air Guitar
Someone forgetting to add Commander to the Skype call
Being Subscribed to Mart on YouTube
Eillah aka Hallie aka Michelle aka Smiley aka Ayla aka...
Making characters at two o'clock in the morning
Taking two hours just to make a simple character
Meti using long words wrong while trying to sound smart
All agreeing on the comics being good, even though we don't read them
